question: What are the recent trends in technology adoption among companies in the healthcare industry?

subtasks.task: Identify and list all companies operating in the healthcare industry along with their technology focus areas and adoption status.
Gather data on the latest deals and contracts related to technology services in the healthcare industry to analyze spending patterns and service types.
Analyze social media engagement metrics of healthcare companies to evaluate public interest and sentiment towards their technological strategies.
Extract recent financial performance metrics from healthcare companies to correlate financial health with technology adoption strategies.
